name: 葉奕良
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。本課程讓學生熟悉機電系統之整合技術與設計(如機電介面之原理、機械系統、感測與致動之原理及其元件、自動控制技術等)。
schedule:
Week 1. preparation week
Week 2. introduction
Week 3. system dynamics and modeling I
Week 4. system dynamics and modeling II
Week 5. 國慶日
Week 6. system dynamics and modeling III
Week 7. disturbances and uncertainties I
Week 8. disturbances and uncertainties II
Week 9. 期中考
Week 10.filtering and measurement I
Week 11.filtering and measurement II
Week 12.controller design I
Week 13.controller design II
Week 14.stability
Week 15.discretization I
Week 16.discretization II
Week 17.introduction to modern control
Week 18.期末考
scorePolicy:
作業    30%
期中考 30%
期末考 40%
